title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the MicroservicesArchitectureTrainer platform, including the target audience, learning objectives, desired features, and any non-functional requirements (e.g., performance, scalability, security).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the platform, including the microservices architecture, communication patterns, data storage strategies, deployment strategies, and scalability considerations.

title: Plan Development and Testing Strategies
description: Define the development and testing strategies, including coding standards, continuous integration and deployment pipelines, and testing frameworks.

title: Design User Interface and User Experience
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the platform, including wireframes, mockups, prototypes, and accessibility considerations. Ensure a consistent and intuitive experience across different devices and screen sizes.

title: Plan Security and Compliance Measures
description: Identify and plan for security and compliance requirements, such as data protection, user authentication, regulatory compliance (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA), secure coding practices, vulnerability management, and security monitoring.
